sect1.title: Using the Application
sect1.para:
To set the time:
To set the date tap on the calendar icon and use the arrows to find the desired month/year. Then tap on the day.
To set the time tap on the clock. Use your stylus to tap and hold on the hour/minute pointers. Drag both pointers untill they are at the desired time.
To set your timezone tap on the timezone tab and than select your zone from the drop down box.
You can also manually/automaticaly set daylight savings by checking the 'Use daylight savings time' box.
You can set the time using the input boxes aswell.
Timezone settings do not take effect untill you log in and out again.
Rotate the hour pointer one full rotation around the clock to go into the 13-24 hour range, or vice-versa.
